column4: I wanted to have a fast linux OS with limited functionality. Geared to the internet and playing multimedia. I have tried splashtop but it seems it doesen't seem work.
It would be slick if, you can boot the linux first and then later boot windows while running linux and then switch to it later. Similar to the function that splashtop has.
your needs are a bit broad. ;) most any distro can do that.
you just described 'zen' i think. or is it xen.
